wikipedia_page.main: Evan Pateshall (born Evan Thomas; December 1817 – 9 April 1885) was a Conservative Party politician.

List of MPs elected in the 1874 United Kingdom general election

response: The Hereford by-election of 1878 was fought on 14 March 1878.  The byelection was fought due to the resignation of the incumbent Conservative MP, Evan Pateshall.  It was won by the Conservative candidate George Arbuthnot.
